mapper.select: SELECT AU.ALLUSER as ALLUSERCNT, RU.RECENTUSER as RECENTUSERCNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(AB.USER_ID) AS ALLUSER FROM BROWNIE_USER AB ) AU, (SELECT COUNT(RB.USER_ID) AS RECENTUSER FROM BROWNIE_USER RB WHERE IN_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE-7 AND SYSDATE) RU
SELECT COUNT(STATUS) AS REPORTUSERCNT FROM REPORT WHERE UPPER(STATUS)='N'

SELECT AB.ALLCNT AS ALLBOARDCNT, RB.RECENTCNT AS RECENTBOARDCNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(NOTICE_YN) AS ALLCNT FROM BROWNIE_BOARD) AB, (SELECT COUNT(NOTICE_YN) AS RECENTCNT FROM BROWNIE_BOARD WHERE UPPER(NOTICE_YN)='N' AND IN_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE-7 AND SYSDATE) RB
